trans-unit.source: Represents an error or warning event that occurred during the use of a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter"></xref> or <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter"></xref>.

You typically use <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataConversionError> objects to determine whether classes that extend <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter> have encountered an error or warning condition by checking the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter.Errors%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter.Errors%2A> properties after importing or exporting the metadata.
Tools can use these error and warning messages to report metadata import and export problems to the user.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataConversionError"></xref> class using the specified message.
By default an error is created.
The error or warning message.
Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified message and isWarning value.
By default an error is created.
The message for the warning or error.
Whether the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataConversionError"></xref> is an error or a warning.
Returns a value that indicates whether two <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataConversionError"></xref> objects have value equality.
For details about reference and value equality, see <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>.
The object with which this object is compared.
`true` if the two <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataConversionError"></xref> objects have value equality; otherwise, `false`.
Returns a value that serves as a hash function for a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataConversionError"></xref> object.
For details about hash codes, see <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A>.
A value suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures, such as a hash table.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataConversionError"></xref> is a warning or an error.
`true` if the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataConversionError"></xref> is to be considered a warning; otherwise, `false`.
The default is `false`.
Gets the error or warning message.
The message for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataConversionError"></xref>.
